title: nbdev-hello-world
text:
How to use
nbdev will say hello to you.

say_hello('Salman')

'Hello Salman!'

title: hello_nbdev
text:
source

foo

 foo ()


source


say_hello

 say_hello (to)

Say hello to somebody

say_hello('Salman')

'Hello Salman!'



assert say_hello('Salman') == 'Hello Salman!'


# assert say_hello('Salman') == 'Hey Salman!'


from fastcore.test import *


test_eq(say_hello('Salman'), 'Hello Salman!')


# test_eq(say_hello('Salman'), 'Hey Salman!')


from IPython.display import display, SVG


display(SVG('<svg height="100" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"><circle cx="50" cy="50" r="40"/></svg>'))
